<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Code Model</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Key assumptions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Whenever possible we use pc-rel encoding since it is smaller(16 bit) than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    absolute(32 bit).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - GOT is reachable within 16 bit offset for both Small and Medium models.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Code section is reachable within 16 bit offset for both models.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+-------------------------+--------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       |          Small          |          Medium</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       +-------------------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       |   Static   |    PIC     |   Static   |    PIC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                branch |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           call global |  absolute  |    @PLT    |  absolute  |    @PLT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         call internal |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            data local |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel   |  ~pc-rel   |  ^pc-rel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       data local big&#42; |   pc-rel   |   pc-rel   |  absolute  |  @GOTOFF</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           data global |   pc-rel   |  @GOTPCREL |  ~pc-rel   |  @GOTPCREL</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      data global big&#42; |   pc-rel   |  @GOTPCREL |  absolute  |  @GOTPCREL</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+------------+-------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       |          Large          |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       +-------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       |   Static   |    PIC     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                branch |  absolute  |   pc-rel   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           call global |  absolute  |    @PLT    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         call internal |  absolute  |   pc-rel   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            data local |  absolute  |  @GOTOFF   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       data local big&#42; |  absolute  |  @GOTOFF   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           data global |  absolute  |  @GOTOFF   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      data global big&#42; |  absolute  |  @GOTOFF   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ---------------------+------------+------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Big data potentially cannot be reached within 16 bit offset and requires</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   special handling for old(x00 and x10) CPUs. Normally these symbols go into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   separate .ldata section which mapped after normal .data and .text, but I</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   don&#39;t really know how this must be done for M68k atm... will try to dig</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   this info out from GCC. For now CPUs prior to M68020 will use static ref</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for Static Model and @GOT based references for PIC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ~ These are absolute for older CPUs for now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ^ These are @GOTOFF for older CPUs for now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Classify a blockaddress reference for the current subtarget according to how</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// we should reference it in a non-pcrel context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/m68ksubtarget/#a469baae35d6f52f0a01f03f13faba992"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/m68ksubtarget/#a469baae35d6f52f0a01f03f13faba992">M68kSubtarget::classifyBlockAddressReference</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/m68ksubtarget/#a8395ba3f6a62aca972d7ab84ab2f84b6">TM</a>.getCodeModel()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unsupported code model&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
